articles.content:

articles.title: Minnesota town evacuated after train derailment
articles.description: The train was carrying ethanol and corn syrup which has caused a large fire, local media reports.
articles.content: A town has been evacuated after a train derailment caused a fire in Kandiyohi County, Minnesota, CBS reports.
